00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include <stdlib.h>
00003 #include <netcdf.h>
00004 #include <time.h>
00005 
00006 /* rank (number of dimensions) for each variable */
00007 #  define RANK_data 3   /* time, col, row */
00008 #  define RANK_time 2  /* time, (exec-time, sim-time, index_fielddesc, index_field1, index_field2..., index_particles) */ 
00009 #  define RANK_field 4  /* time, x, y, z */
00010 #  define RANK_fielddesc 3 /* time, field, desc */
00011 #  define RANK_selfields 3
00012 #  define RANK_vecField 5 /*time, x, y, z, components */
00013 #  define RANK_vecFielddesc 2 /* time, desc */
00014 #  define RANK_selVecField 2
00015 
00016    /* variable ids */
00017 static int data_id=-1;
00018 /* static int mintime_id=-1; */
00019 static int time_id;
00020 static int timeid_start=0;
00021 static int field_id1 = -1;
00022 static int field_id2 = -1;
00023 static int field_id3 = -1;
00024 static int field_id4 = -1;
00025 
00026 static int field_desc_id = -1;
00027 
00028 static int sel_fields_id = -1;
00029 
00030 static int vecField_id = -1;
00031 static int vecField_desc_id = -1;
00032 static int sel_vecField_id = -1;
00033 
00034 static int timeid_start_particles=0;
00035 static int timeid_start_fielddesc = 0;
00036 static int timeid_start_field1 = 0;
00037 static int timeid_start_field2 = 0;
00038 static int timeid_start_field3 = 0;
00039 static int timeid_start_field4 = 0;
00040 static int timeid_start_vecField = 0; 
00041 static int timeid_start_vecFielddesc = 0;
00042 
00043   /* dimension lengths */
00044 static  size_t cols_len = -1;
00045 static  size_t rows_len = -1;
00046 static  size_t timeid_len = NC_UNLIMITED;
00047 static  size_t x_len = -1;
00048 static  size_t y_len = -1;
00049 static  size_t z_len = -1;
00050 
00051 static size_t component_len = -1; 
00052 
00053 static time_t begin;
00054 
00055 
00056 void check_err(const int stat, const int line, const char *file) {
00057   if (stat != NC_NOERR) {
00058     (void) fprintf(stderr, "line %d of %s: %s\n", line, file, nc_strerror(stat));
00059     exit(1);
00060   }
00061 }

00065 int _ncnbody_open(int rows, int cols, int x, int y, int z, int *pncid) {
00066   
00067   int  ncid;                    /* netCDF id */
00068 
00069   /* dimension ids */
00070   int cols_dim;
00071   int rows_dim;
00072   int timeid_dim;
00073   int time_and_indices_dim;
00074 
00075   /* field dims */
00076   int xdim;
00077   int ydim;
00078   int zdim;
00079   int compdim;
00080 
00081   int fielddesc_dim;
00082   int fieldnr_dim;
00083   int selfield_dim;
00084   
00085   int vecFielddesc_dim;
00086   int selvecField_dim;
00087 
00088   /* variable shapes */
00089   int data_dims[RANK_data];
00090 /*   int mintime_dims[RANK_mintime]; */
00091   int time_dims[RANK_time];
00092   /*field*/
00093   int field_dims[RANK_field];
00094   int field_desc_dims[RANK_fielddesc];
00095   int sel_field_dims[RANK_selfields];
00096 
00097   /*vecField*/
00098   int vecField_dims[RANK_vecField];
00099   int vecFielddesc_dims[RANK_vecFielddesc];
00100   int selVecField_dims[RANK_selVecField];
00101 
00102 
00103   begin = time(NULL); 
00104   cols_len=cols;
00105   rows_len=rows;
00106   
00107   x_len = x;
00108   y_len = y;
00109   z_len = z;
00110   component_len = 3; /* for vecFields */
00111 
00112   printf("WF ncnbody_open: rows=%d, cols=%d\n",cols_len,rows_len);
00113 
00114   /* enter define mode */
00115   int stat = nc_create("nbody.nc", NC_CLOBBER, &ncid);
00116   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00117 
00118   /* define dimensions */
00119   stat = nc_def_dim(ncid, "cols", cols_len, &cols_dim);
00120   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00121   stat = nc_def_dim(ncid, "rows", rows_len, &rows_dim);
00122   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00123   stat = nc_def_dim(ncid, "timeid", timeid_len, &timeid_dim);
00124   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00125   stat =  nc_def_dim(ncid, "time_and_indices", 10, &time_and_indices_dim);
00126 
00127   /* field, vecField */
00128   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "xdim", x_len, &xdim );
00129   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00130   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "ydim", y_len, &ydim );
00131   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00132   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "zdim", z_len, &zdim );
00133   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00134   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "compdim", component_len, &compdim );
00135 
00136 
00137   /* field desc */
00138   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "fielddesc_dim", 6, &fielddesc_dim );
00139   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00140   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "fieldnr_dim", 4, &fieldnr_dim );
00141   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00142 
00143   /* field selection */
00144   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "selfield_dim", 1, &selfield_dim );
00145   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00146 
00147   /* vecField desc */
00148   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "vecFielddesc_dims", 6, &vecFielddesc_dim );
00149   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00150   
00151   /* vecField selection */
00152   stat = nc_def_dim( ncid, "selVecField_dims", 1, &selvecField_dim );
00153   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00154  
00155  
00156   /* define variables */
00157 
00158   data_dims[0] = timeid_dim;
00159   data_dims[1] = rows_dim;
00160   data_dims[2] = cols_dim;
00161   stat = nc_def_var(ncid, "data", NC_FLOAT, RANK_data, data_dims, &data_id);
00162   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00163 
00164   field_dims[0] = timeid_dim;
00165   field_dims[1] = xdim;
00166   field_dims[2] = ydim;
00167   field_dims[3] = zdim;
00168  
00169   field_desc_dims[0] = timeid_dim;
00170   field_desc_dims[1] = fieldnr_dim;
00171   field_desc_dims[2] = fielddesc_dim;
00172 
00173   sel_field_dims[0] = timeid_dim;
00174   sel_field_dims[1] = fieldnr_dim;
00175   sel_field_dims[2] = selfield_dim;
00176 
00177   vecField_dims[0] = timeid_dim; 
00178   vecField_dims[1] = xdim; 
00179   vecField_dims[2] = ydim;
00180   vecField_dims[3] = zdim;
00181   vecField_dims[4] = compdim;
00182 
00183   vecFielddesc_dims[0] = timeid_dim;
00184   vecFielddesc_dims[1] = vecFielddesc_dim;
00185   
00186   selVecField_dims[0] = timeid_dim;
00187   selVecField_dims[1] = selvecField_dim;
00188  
00189 
00190   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "field1", NC_FLOAT, RANK_field, field_dims, &field_id1 );
00191   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00192 
00193   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "field2", NC_FLOAT, RANK_field, field_dims, &field_id2 );
00194   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00195 
00196   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "field3", NC_FLOAT, RANK_field, field_dims, &field_id3 );
00197   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00198 
00199   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "field4", NC_FLOAT, RANK_field, field_dims, &field_id4 );
00200   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00201 
00202   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "fielddesc", NC_FLOAT, RANK_fielddesc, field_desc_dims, &field_desc_id );
00203   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00204 
00205   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "sel_fields", NC_INT, RANK_selfields, sel_field_dims, &sel_fields_id );
00206   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00207 
00208   
00209   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "vecField1", NC_FLOAT, RANK_vecField, vecField_dims, &vecField_id );
00210   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00211 
00212   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "vecFielddesc", NC_FLOAT, RANK_vecFielddesc, vecFielddesc_dims, &vecField_desc_id );
00213   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00214 
00215   stat = nc_def_var( ncid, "sel_vecFields", NC_INT, RANK_selVecField, selVecField_dims, &sel_vecField_id );
00216   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00217   
00218 /*   mintime_dims[0] = timeid_dim; */
00219   time_dims[0] = timeid_dim;
00220   time_dims[1] = time_and_indices_dim;
00221   
00222   stat = nc_def_var(ncid, "time_and_indices", NC_FLOAT, RANK_time, time_dims, &time_id);
00223   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00224 
00225   /* leave define mode */
00226   stat = nc_enddef (ncid);
00227   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00228   printf("WF ncnbody_open: rows=%d, cols=%d ready ncid=%d\n",cols_len,rows_len,ncid);
00229 
00230   timeid_start=0;  
00231   timeid_start_particles = 0;
00232   timeid_start_fielddesc = 0;
00233   static int timeid_start_field1 = 0;
00234   static int timeid_start_field2 = 0;
00235   static int timeid_start_field3 = 0;
00236   static int timeid_start_field4 = 0;
00237   
00238   static int timeid_start_vecField = 0;
00239   timeid_start_vecFielddesc = 0;
00240 
00241   *pncid=ncid;
00242   return(1); 
00243 }

00246   *ret=_ncnbody_open(*rows,*cols,*x, *y, *z, ncid);
00247   return;

00260 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00261 int _ncnbody_put(int ncid,float *vbuffer,int lstored,int vbufcols) {
00262   int stat;
00263   static size_t time_start[RANK_time];
00264   static size_t time_count[RANK_time];
00265   static size_t data_start[RANK_data];
00266   static size_t data_count[RANK_data];
00267   static float time[10];
00268   size_t time_len;
00269 /*   time_t now = time(NULL); */
00270   
00271 /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols); */
00272   
00273   /* store time */
00274   time_len = 10;                
00275   time_start[0] = timeid_start;
00276   time_start[1] = 0;
00277   time_count[0] = 1;
00278   time_count[1] = time_len;
00279   time[0] = vbuffer[0]; /* simtime, first value of first record */   
00280   time[1] = 0.1 ;/* (float)(now - begin );  exectime */
00281   time[2] = timeid_start_fielddesc;
00282   time[3] = timeid_start_field1;
00283   time[4] = timeid_start_field2;
00284   time[5] = timeid_start_field3;
00285   time[6] = timeid_start_field4;
00286   time[7] = timeid_start_particles;
00287   time[8] = timeid_start_vecField;
00288   time[9] = timeid_start_vecFielddesc;
00289 
00290   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, time_id, time_start, time_count, time);
00291   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00292 
00293   
00294   time_len = 1;                 /* number of records of data data */
00295   data_start[0] = timeid_start_particles;
00296   data_start[1] = 0;
00297   data_start[2] = 0;
00298   data_count[0] = time_len;
00299   data_count[1] = rows_len;
00300   data_count[2] = cols_len;
00301   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, data_id, data_start, data_count, vbuffer);
00302   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00303 
00304 /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00305   nc_sync(ncid);
00306 /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d sync ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00307   
00308   timeid_start++;
00309   timeid_start_particles++;
00310 
00311   return(stat);
00312 }
00313 
00314 void* ncnbody_put_(int *ncid,float *vbuffer,int *lstored,int *vbufcols, int *rc) {
00315   *rc=_ncnbody_put(*ncid,vbuffer, *lstored, *vbufcols);
00316   return;
00317 }

00329 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00330 int _ncnbody_putfield(int ncid, float simtime, int fieldnr, int xdim, int ydim, int zdim, float *vbuffer) {
00331   int stat;
00332 
00333   static size_t time_start[RANK_time];
00334   static size_t time_count[RANK_time];
00335   static size_t field_start[RANK_field];
00336   static size_t field_count[RANK_field];
00337  
00338 
00339   static float time[10];
00340   size_t time_len;
00341 /*   time_t now = time(NULL); */
00342   
00343 /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols); */
00344   
00345   /* store time */
00346   time_len = 10;                
00347   time_start[0] = timeid_start;
00348   time_start[1] = 0;
00349   time_count[0] = 1;
00350   time_count[1] = time_len;
00351   time[0] = vbuffer[0]; /* simtime, first value of first record */   
00352   time[1] = 0.1 ;/* (float)(now - begin );  exectime */
00353   time[2] = timeid_start_fielddesc;
00354   time[3] = timeid_start_field1;
00355   time[4] = timeid_start_field2;
00356   time[5] = timeid_start_field3;
00357   time[6] = timeid_start_field4;
00358   time[7] = timeid_start_particles;
00359   time[8] = timeid_start_vecField;
00360   time[9] = timeid_start_vecFielddesc;
00361 
00362   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, time_id, time_start, time_count, time);
00363   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00364 
00365   field_start[1] = 0;
00366   field_start[2] = 0;
00367   field_start[3] = 0;
00368   
00369   field_count[0] = 1;
00370   field_count[1] = xdim;
00371   field_count[2] = ydim;
00372   field_count[3] = zdim;
00373   
00374   switch( fieldnr ){
00375   case 1:
00376     field_start[0] = timeid_start_field1; 
00377     stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, field_id1, field_start, field_count, vbuffer);
00378     check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00379     timeid_start_field1++;
00380   break;
00381   case 2: 
00382     field_start[0] = timeid_start_field2; 
00383     stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, field_id2, field_start, field_count, vbuffer);
00384     check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00385     timeid_start_field2++;
00386     break;
00387   case 3: 
00388     field_start[0] = timeid_start_field3; 
00389     stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, field_id3, field_start, field_count, vbuffer);
00390     check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00391     timeid_start_field3++;
00392     break;
00393   case 4: 
00394     field_start[0] = timeid_start_field4; 
00395     stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, field_id4, field_start, field_count, vbuffer);
00396     check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00397     timeid_start_field4++;
00398     break;
00399 
00400   }
00401   /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00402   nc_sync(ncid);
00403   /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d sync ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00404   
00405   return(stat);
00406 }

00423 int _ncnbody_putvecfield(int ncid, float simtime, int xdim, int ydim, int zdim, float *vbuffer) {
00424   int stat;
00425 
00426   static size_t time_start[RANK_time];
00427   static size_t time_count[RANK_time];
00428   static size_t field_start[RANK_vecField];
00429   static size_t field_count[RANK_vecField];
00430   int compdim = 3;
00431 
00432   static float time[10];
00433   size_t time_len;
00434 /*   time_t now = time(NULL); */
00435   
00436 /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols); */
00437   
00438   /* store time */
00439   time_len = 10;                
00440   time_start[0] = timeid_start;
00441   time_start[1] = 0;
00442   time_count[0] = 1;
00443   time_count[1] = time_len;
00444   time[0] = vbuffer[0]; /* simtime, first value of first record */   
00445   time[1] = 0.1 ;/* (float)(now - begin );  exectime */
00446   time[2] = timeid_start_fielddesc;
00447   time[3] = timeid_start_field1;
00448   time[4] = timeid_start_field2;
00449   time[5] = timeid_start_field3;
00450   time[6] = timeid_start_field4;
00451   time[7] = timeid_start_particles;
00452   time[8] = timeid_start_vecField;
00453   time[9] = timeid_start_vecFielddesc;
00454 
00455   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, time_id, time_start, time_count, time);
00456   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00457 
00458   field_start[0] = timeid_start_vecField;
00459   field_start[1] = 0;
00460   field_start[2] = 0;
00461   field_start[3] = 0;
00462   field_start[4] = 0; 
00463   
00464   field_count[0] = 1;
00465   field_count[1] = xdim;
00466   field_count[2] = ydim;
00467   field_count[3] = zdim;
00468   field_count[4] = compdim;
00469   
00470   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, vecField_id, field_start, field_count, vbuffer);
00471   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00472   timeid_start_vecField++;
00473   
00474 
00475   /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00476   nc_sync(ncid);
00477   /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d sync ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00478   
00479   return(stat);
00480 }

00496 int _ncnbody_putvecfielddesc(int ncid, float simtime, float *vbuffer ) {
00497   int stat;
00498   int i, j;
00499   static size_t time_start[RANK_time];
00500   static size_t time_count[RANK_time];
00501   static size_t vecFielddesc_start[RANK_vecFielddesc];
00502   static size_t vecFielddesc_count[RANK_vecFielddesc] = {1,6};
00503   
00504   static float time[10];
00505   size_t time_len;
00506   /*   time_t now = time(NULL); */
00507   
00508   vecFielddesc_start[0] = timeid_start_vecFielddesc-1; 
00509   vecFielddesc_start[1] = 0;
00510   time_len = 10;                
00511   time_start[0] = timeid_start;
00512   time_start[1] = 0;
00513   time_count[0] = 1;
00514   time_count[1] = time_len;
00515

00517   time[1] = 0.1;   /*(float) ( now - begin );  exectime */
00518   time[2] = timeid_start_fielddesc-1;
00519   time[3] = timeid_start_field1;
00520   time[4] = timeid_start_field2;
00521   time[5] = timeid_start_field3;

00523   time[7] = timeid_start_particles;
00524   time[8] = timeid_start_vecField;
00525   time[9] = timeid_start_vecFielddesc;
00526 
00527   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, time_id, time_start, time_count, time);
00528   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00529    printf("WF _ncnbody_putvecfielddesc: ncid=%d\n",ncid);
00530    for( j = 0; j < vecFielddesc_count[1]; j++ ){
00531      printf( "%f ", vbuffer[j] );
00532    }
00533    printf( "\n" );
00534    
00535    
00536   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, vecField_desc_id, vecFielddesc_start, vecFielddesc_count, vbuffer);
00537   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00538 
00539   /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00540   nc_sync(ncid);
00541   /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d sync ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00542   
00543   printf("WF _ncnbody_putvecfielddesc: ncid=%d ready, stat = %d\n",ncid, stat); 
00544   return(stat);
00545 }

00589   time[9] = timeid_start_vecFielddesc;

00627 int _ncnbody_putfielddesc(int ncid, float simtime, float *vbuffer ) {
00628   int stat;
00629   int i, j;
00630   static size_t time_start[RANK_time];
00631   static size_t time_count[RANK_time];
00632   static size_t fielddesc_start[RANK_fielddesc];
00633   static size_t fielddesc_count[RANK_fielddesc] = {1, 4, 6};
00634 
00635   
00636   static float time[10];
00637   size_t time_len;
00638   /*   time_t now = time(NULL); */
00639   
00640   fielddesc_start[0] = timeid_start_fielddesc-1; 
00641   fielddesc_start[1] = 0;
00642   fielddesc_start[2] = 0;
00643   time_len = 10;                
00644   time_start[0] = timeid_start;
00645   time_start[1] = 0;
00646   time_count[0] = 1;
00647   time_count[1] = time_len;
00648   
00649   time[0] = simtime;
00650   time[1] = 0.1;   /*(float) ( now - begin );  exectime */
00651   time[2] = timeid_start_fielddesc-1;
00652   time[3] = timeid_start_field1;
00653   time[4] = timeid_start_field2;
00654   time[5] = timeid_start_field3;
00655   time[6] = timeid_start_field4;
00656   time[7] = timeid_start_particles;
00657   time[8] = timeid_start_vecField;
00658   time[9] = timeid_start_vecFielddesc;
00659 
00660   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, time_id, time_start, time_count, time);
00661   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00662    printf("WF _ncnbody_putfielddesc: ncid=%d\n",ncid);
00663    for( i = 0; i < fielddesc_count[1]; i++ ){
00664      printf( "field%d : ", i );
00665      for( j = 0; j < fielddesc_count[2]; j++ ){
00666        printf( "%f ", vbuffer[6*i+j] );
00667      }
00668      printf( "\n" );
00669    }
00670    
00671   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, field_desc_id, fielddesc_start, fielddesc_count, vbuffer);
00672   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00673 
00674   /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00675   nc_sync(ncid);
00676   /*   printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d sync ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */
00677   
00678   printf("WF _ncnbody_putfielddesc: ncid=%d ready, stat = %d\n",ncid, stat); 
00679   return(stat);
00680 }

00697 int _ncnbody_putselfield(int ncid, float simtime, int selfield1, int selfield2, int selfield3, int selfield4 ) {
00698   int stat;
00699   int selfield[4];
00700 
00701   static size_t time_start[RANK_time];
00702   static size_t time_count[RANK_time];
00703   static size_t selfield_start[3];
00704   static size_t selfield_count[3] = {1, 4, 1};
00705 
00706   static float time[10];
00707   size_t time_len;
00708 /*   time_t now = time(NULL); */
00709 
00710   time_len = 10;                
00711   time_start[0] = timeid_start;
00712   time_start[1] = 0;
00713   time_count[0] = 1;
00714   time_count[1] = time_len;
00715   
00716   time[0] = simtime;
00717   time[1] = 0.1;   /*(float) ( now - begin );  exectime */
00718   time[2] = timeid_start_fielddesc;
00719   time[3] = timeid_start_field1;
00720   time[4] = timeid_start_field2;
00721   time[5] = timeid_start_field3;
00722   time[6] = timeid_start_field4;
00723   time[7] = timeid_start_particles;
00724   time[8] = timeid_start_vecField;
00725   time[9] = timeid_start_vecFielddesc;
00726 
00727   stat = nc_put_vara_float(ncid, time_id, time_start, time_count, time);
00728   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);
00729   
00730

00732   selfield[1] = selfield2;
00733   selfield[2] = selfield3;
00734   selfield[3] = selfield4;
00735   
00736   selfield_start[0] = timeid_start_fielddesc; 
00737   selfield_start[1] = 0;
00738   selfield_start[2] = 0;
00739   
00740 
00741   printf("WF _ncnbody_putselfield: ncid=%d, selfields=%d, %d, %d, %d\n",ncid,selfield1, selfield2, selfield3, selfield4); 
00742

00744   check_err(stat,__LINE__,__FILE__);

00746 
00747  /*     printf("WF _ncnbody_put: ncid=%d, lstored=%d vbufcols=%d ready stat=%d\n",ncid,lstored,vbufcols,stat); */

00750   
00751   timeid_start_fielddesc++;
00752   timeid_start++;

00754   return(stat);
